record.title: ORDERS FOR MONDAY, FEBRUARY 4, 2008
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR MONDAY, FEBRUARY 4, 2008 -- (Senate - January 31, 2008)

[Page: S559]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m., Monday, February 4; that following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, the time for the two leaders be reserved for their use later in the day, and the Senate resume consideration of S. 2248, the FISA legislation.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
